name: Mutation Garden
description:
Grab monsters and toss em into your garden to grow your crops and help them mutate into new types!

Instructions

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys

Main mechanic: Go up to some enemies, hover your mouse over (or near) them then hold click - now they're grabbed and you can drag them with your mouse. Bring them over to your garden, then drop them (release click) onto the crops. This will kill the enemies you're holding and feed them to the crops they dropped on.

Your goal

On the left of the screen, you'll see a box titled "Mutation Progress" - this shows how many crops have been fully grown into each mutation type. You win once all mutation types have reached 100%.

Note: The "Mutation Progress" box also shows "Speed" at the bottom. This is your character's movement speed, which increases when you pick up hearts (dropped by enemies).
